content.raw: Just a thought: A strategy where a robot navigates, discovers the artifacts, drives back to the staging area and reports all of them won’t work, right? Because the levels will be unloaded when the robot reports all the artifacts from the staging area. If that’s the case, maybe we have to remember the pose of the artifact or something similar.
content.html: Just a thought: A strategy where a robot navigates, discovers the artifacts, drives back to the staging area and reports all of them won’t work, right? Because the levels will be unloaded when the robot reports all the artifacts from the staging area. If that’s the case, maybe we have to remember the pose of the artifact or something similar.
